```{r}
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(dtplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(data.table)

data1 <- fread("~/Desktop/Project_Intro_Data_Management/link2020usnum.csv", select=c('mrace6'))
data2 <- fread("/Users/grazianoperegrino/Desktop/Project_Intro_Data_Management/link2020usden.csv", select=c('mrace6'))

tibble(data1)
tibble(data2)
data1

data1_counts <- data1 %>%
  select(mrace6) %>%
  count(mrace6) %>%
  rename(num_counts = n) %>%
  group_by(mrace6)

data1_counts <- data.frame(data1_counts)

data2_counts <- data2 %>%
  select(mrace6) %>%
  count(mrace6) %>%
  rename(denom_counts = n) %>%
  group_by(mrace6)

data2_counts <- data.frame(data2_counts)

data <- cbind.data.frame(data1_counts, data2_counts$denom_counts)%>%
  mutate(proportion = (num_counts/data2_counts$denom_counts)*1000)

data
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data, aes(fill=mrace6, y=proportion, x=mrace6)) + 
    geom_bar(stat = "identity")+ theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust=1)) +
  labs(title="Race Distribution for Trans People (Weighted & Unweighted)")

```
